item.title: how to add a custom domain to your hugo site?
item.description: This post introduce how to configure an apex domain to your hugo site. A lot of people prefer to have a custom domain instead “http:XXXX.github.io”. Let’s go through the steps to add your domain name to your hugo site: Step 1: acquire a domain: I got my domain name from Google Domains. Depends on different domain names, the prices are different. For example, my domain name “JiaxinZheng.com” costs 12 bucks per year.
